name: chewy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
Chewy food needs to be chewed a lot before it is swallowed: The meat was tasteless and chewy.

(of food) needing to be crushed a lot with the teeth before it is swallowed: We enjoyed the fine, chewy, thick-crusted bread.
